text: Zisas nen mbe nzuaim, mba ana phorga rui gumgi, mbe kha nzambaren ana muuŋgi, “Guman Rum, mba farfa maaŋgi tugar hɨrie? Ram mbui khesharigi bigi hɨgɨrim, nza gangip kaŋgirga, mba bigi hɨrga tuk han mbarigi?” 21.7 Mbe Grikar kaman kha kameŋ “Guman Rum” khaŋ nzuai, “Ndɨkndɨgi vhuuin nza khɨvi guma.”
